name: The Leet Adventure (Demo V1)
description:
The Leet Adventure is a story about a teen, Leet, who wants to explore the World of Ferra and at the same time become a World famous adventurer like the legendary hero, Kaylum. 

This demo is an early version demo of Chapter 1 that will eventually become the full demo for my game, Chapters 2, 3, 4, and 5 will complete the game. and upon release will be for sale.

This demo is free but donations are very much welcomed and all proceeds will go towards adding new assets to the game, such as monsters, sound/music, voice acting, and speeding up the development of the full game in general.

If you wish you can also buy me a coffee here to keep me chugging along throughout development of TLA. 
https://www.buymeacoffee.com/SEGaming/the-leet-adventure

IF you decide to make any type of social Media post of my project then please send me a link in the comments so I may take a look at your media.

NOTE: Please keep in mind, this is a demo of the main chapter 1 demo that will come in the future so things might be slightly changed for that version from this one, expect to see typos and such,  i'm a solo dev and a lot of this project is developed sleep deprived and in early hours of the morning.. LOL!

WARNING! This game CAN NOT be sold by anyone, distributed by anyone on any other website, or claim the game as their own. Any assets ripped from this game is in violation of Copyright and action WILL be taken.
